    <option value="GFN2xTB">semi-empirical quantum mechanics (GFN2xTB)</option>

</select>

script: Select a predefined collection of molecules:
Color code: vibration - rotation - translation

ops.insert: This tools allows you to predict IR spectra using semi-empirical quantum chemistry techniques. But not only that. It also animates the vibrations and links them to the structure in an interactive way. Additionally, we provide collections that illustrate important electronic effects (e.g., inductive, mesomeric effect)
